verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w cry|strong="H7440"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w attend|strong="H7181"\w* unto my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*.

From the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* will I \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* unto thee, when my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w overwhelmed|strong="H5848"\w*: \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* me to the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \add that\add* is \w higher|strong="H7311"\w* than I.
For thou hast been a \w shelter|strong="H4268"\w* for me, \add and\add* a \w strong|strong="H5797"\w* \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*.

I will \w abide|strong="H1481"\w* in thy \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: I will \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in the \w covert|strong="H5643"\w* of thy \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 61.4 \ft trust: or, make my refuge\f*

For thou, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* my \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*: thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \add me\add* the \w heritage|strong="H3425"\w* of those that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

Thou wilt \w prolong|strong="H3254"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*: \add and\add* his \w years|strong="H8141"\w* as \w many|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.\f + \fr 61.6 \ft Thou…: Heb. Thou shalt add days to the days of the king\f*\f + \fr 61.6 \ft as…: Heb. as generation and generation\f*

He shall \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: O \w prepare|strong="H4487"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, \add which\add* may \w preserve|strong="H5341"\w* him.

So will I \w sing|strong="H2167"\w* praise unto thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*, that I may \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \w perform|strong="H7999"\w* my \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*.
